title: Add Efrit MCP queue integration examples
description:
Create examples showing how terminal AI agents can communicate with Efrit via MCP file-based queues.

## Background
Efrit provides AI-to-AI communication via ~/.emacs.d/.efrit/queues/:
- requests/ - Drop JSON requests here
- processing/ - Currently being processed  
- responses/ - Completed responses
- archive/ - Historical requests

## Tasks
- Create shell script for sending requests to Efrit
- Add Python example for queue interaction
- Document request/response JSON format
- Show eval, command, chat, and status request types

## Acceptance Criteria
- Working examples in experiments/ directory
- Integration tested with Claude Code
- Documentation in README
